p:
From the recent UK Biobank and arcOGEN GWAS meta-analysis
8 , we obtained the results of a gene-level analysis for each of the four osteoarthritis phenotypes (self-reported plus hospital diagnosed, hospital diagnosed knee or hip, hospital diagnosed knee, hospital diagnosed hip), as described in the GWAS paper. Briefly, this analysis used MAGMA v1.06
69 and was based on the mean SNP log- p-value in the gene, accounting for LD.
